pluggable.name: Twitter Comments
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Replace comment form fields with one for twitter username.

help.value:
Activate this plugin and your ordinary comment form will be replaced with a simpler, cleaner one asking only for a twitter username with the comment.

Just as with the regular comment form, there is no authentication, so commenters can impersonate others.

If you'd like to show avatar images, you can easily do so by using tweetimag.es:

<?php if ( $comment->info->twitter_comment ) { ?> <img src="<?php echo "http://img.tweetimag.es/i/{$comment->name}_n"; ?>" height="48" width="48" alt="<?php echo $comment->name; ?>"> <?php } ?>

Inspired by Joey Primiani.
